alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 8:09PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Heavy rainfall will impact portions of southern Essex, north central Norfolk, Suffolk and northeastern Middlesex Counties with minor flooding through 915 PM EDT... At 807 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a heavy rainfall over Weston, or over Wellesley, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Boston, Cambridge, Lynn, Newton, Lawrence, Somerville, Haverhill, Waltham, Malden, Brookline, Medford, Revere, Peabody, Arlington, Everett, Salem, Billerica, Beverly, Woburn, and Chelsea. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex; Western Norfolk
